qa_pairs.question: Pedro / utla
qa_pairs.answer: Pedro utla ra sa. (Pedro is in the house.)
qa_pairs.instructions: Combine the two nouns to form a sentence, then say what it means. E.g. Mary / rum -> Mary rum ra sa. (Mary is in the room.)

qa_pairs.question: tibil / rum
qa_pairs.answer: Tibil ba rum ra sa. (The table is in the room.)
qa_pairs.instructions: Combine the two nouns to form a sentence, then say what it means. E.g. Mary / rum -> Mary rum ra sa. (Mary is in the room.)

qa_pairs.question: yul / utla
qa_pairs.answer: Yul ba utla ra sa. (The dog is in the house.)
qa_pairs.instructions: Combine the two nouns to form a sentence, then say what it means. E.g. Mary / rum -> Mary rum ra sa. (Mary is in the room.)

qa_pairs.question: waitna / dur
qa_pairs.answer: Waitna ba dur ra sa. (The man is at the door.)
qa_pairs.instructions: Combine the two nouns to form a sentence, then say what it means. E.g. Mary / rum -> Mary rum ra sa. (Mary is in the room.)

qa_pairs.question: buk / tasba
qa_pairs.answer: Buk ba tasba ra sa. (The book is on the ground.)
qa_pairs.instructions: Combine the two nouns to form a sentence, then say what it means. E.g. Mary / rum -> Mary rum ra sa. (Mary is in the room.)

qa_pairs.question: Lucia / windar
qa_pairs.answer: Lucia windar ra sa. (Lucia is at the window.)
qa_pairs.instructions: Combine the two nouns to form a sentence, then say what it means. E.g. Mary / rum -> Mary rum ra sa. (Mary is in the room.)

qa_pairs.question: Witin nani dia want sa ki?
qa_pairs.instructions: Translate to English:

qa_pairs.question: Man nani dur ba ahkia kwakwaisma?
qa_pairs.answer: When are you (pl.) going to open the door?
qa_pairs.instructions: Translate to English:

qa_pairs.question: Yang nani dur ba yauhka kwakwaisna, bara man nani dimaisma.
qa_pairs.answer: We will open the door tomorrow, and then you will come in.
qa_pairs.instructions: Translate to English:

qa_pairs.question: Witin nani naha tiarka nani ra dia muni ikan?
qa_pairs.answer: Why did they kill these youths?
qa_pairs.instructions: Translate to English:

qa_pairs.question: Yang nani nu apia sna.
qa_pairs.instructions: Translate to English:

qa_pairs.question: Witin nani yang nani wal aisisa.
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Man nani yang nani wal aisisma.
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Yang nani man nani wal aisisna.
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Yawan dia daukaisa ki?
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Yang nani dia daukaisna ki?
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Yang nani inska want sna.
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Man nani sin inska want sma ki?
qa_pairs.answer: Man nani sin inska want sma ki?
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Au, yang nani sin.
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Yawan sut inska want sa.
qa_pairs.instructions: If it is possible to use banghwaia, use it and omit the superfluous pronoun.

qa_pairs.question: Man nani Miskitu __________? (aisaia)
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Apia, yang nani Miskitu __________. (aisaia)
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Tuktiki nani ba Miskitu __________ banghwisa. (aisaia)
qa_pairs.answer: Tuktiki nani ba Miskitu aisi banghwisa.
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Aisikam Bilwi ra naiwa __________ ki? (waia)
qa_pairs.answer: Aisikam Bilwi ra naiwa auya ki?
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Apia, witin naiwa __________. (waia)
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Nahwala __________. (waia)
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Baha waitnika nani ba sin witin wal __________ banghwan. (waia)
qa_pairs.answer: Baha waitnika nani ba sin witin wal wi banghwan.
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Yauhka man dia __________? (piaia)
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Nu apia sna. Yang diara kum sin __________. (briaia)
qa_pairs.answer: Nu apia sna. Yang diara kum sin briras.
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Yang nahwala mangu kum kum __________. (piaia)
qa_pairs.answer: Yang nahwala mangu kum kum pin.
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Baha tiarka nani ba plun __________ ki? (briaia)
qa_pairs.answer: Baha tiarka nani ba plun brisa ki?
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Au, witin nani plun __________ banghwisa. (piaia)
qa_pairs.answer: Au, witin nani plun pi banghwisa.
qa_pairs.instructions: Complete the sentence using the right form of the verb given.

qa_pairs.question: Jan tibil kum brisa. (tara sa)
qa_pairs.instructions:
Follow this example:
 Maria buk kum brisa. (pain sa) →

qa_pairs.question: Karla yul kum brisa. (sirpi sa)
qa_pairs.instructions:
Follow this example:

qa_pairs.question: Yabal ba walpa kum kum brisa. (ailal)
qa_pairs.answer: Yabal walpaya nani ba ailal sa.

qa_pairs.question: Awala ba li brisa. (tawan tuktika nani ba di banghwan)
qa_pairs.answer: Tawan tuktika nani ba awala laya ba di banghwan.

qa_pairs.question: Yawan tasba brisa. (yawan iwras kan)
